description: An object for featuring a brand or cocktail in the Browse portion of the app

bannerImageURL.description: The primary image associated with the promotion.

bannerPressStateImageURL.description: An image displayed when the promotion is pressed.

brand.description: A brand associated with the promotion. Note: a promotion is always associated with a brand, a cocktail, a list of products, or a link, but never with more than one.

cocktail.description: A cocktail associated with the promotion. Note: a promotion is always associated with a brand, a cocktail, a list of products, or a link, but never with more than one.

items.description: Items associated with the promotion. If a single item is specified, the app will navigate to a product details screen. Else, a product list. Note: a promotion is always associated with a brand, a cocktail, a list of products, or a link, but never with more than one.

link.description: An external URL to open when the promotion is selected.
